body.name: Body pHresh and Clean pH Balance Feminine Wash with Boric Acid | Odor-Control | 10fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 38 mins
features: Balancing Intimate Wash - Our unique formula, designed by doctors, contains boric acid which helps gently promote a balanced vaginal environment and helps you stay protected against funky odors.

Gently Soothing - Our comforting intimate wash with boric acid balances your natural pH range and gently removes odor. Essential oils support your natural microbiome and leave you feeling fresh and clean for hours.

Safe and Gentle Daily Wash - pHresh and Clean is a daily wash for vaginas in need of some extra TLC. This gentle, calming wash cleanses and hydrates sensitive vulvas without stripping you of the good stuff.

Feel Cared For - Our bodies are amazing and deserve the best! We make knowing your body easy & loving your parts the norm. Above all, loyal seeks to normalize how we view our bodies as something to be celebrated and cared for.
LEGAL DISCLAIMER - These statements have NOT been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Loyal Boric Life - Boric Acid Vaginal Suppositories Loyal The Helper Vaginal Suppository Applicators Loyal All My [PH]EELS Full Range pH Test Strips 1-14 Loyal Daily Flora pH Balancing Oral Supplement Loyal Intimist Rosewater Moisturizing Deodorant Spray Size 30 Count 15 Count 100-Test Roll 60 Count 2 fl oz Form Suppository Applicator Strip Capsule Oil Spray Product Description Boric Life's natural properties create a balanced intimate environment. These suppositories are odor-controlling & soothing Since a hands-on approach isn't for everyone, these intimate suppository applicators make it a whole lot easier to get the job done and far less messy Our easy-to-use All My [PH]EELS pH test strips can help you determine if your pH is unbalanced. Convenient, portable, & accurate, these strips monitor pH levels anytime, anywhere Daily Flora promotes healthy insides from your gut to your intimate area. Blended with probiotics and all-natural ingredients Intimist is your anytime hydrating and deodorizing intimate mist. This blend of refreshing essential oils promotes pH balance, odor control, and discomfort relief

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: EDIT: Set up Subscribe and Save....got one bottle and then the price went up by FIVE DOLLARS per bottle?! FMLI love this nook wash. It COMPLETELY eliminates body odor! I bathe daily after workouts or sweat-inducing physical labor, and there is no scent at all 24 hours later....not even normal healthy cooter aroma. I also use it to wash my pits, and I never get gamey anymore, like...EVER! I'm setting this up on subscribe & save so I can share it with my husband. He bathes at least twice daily because he hates when his pits smell, in his words, "all oniony". I just won't tell him it's a wash for girly bits ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Looooove this wash
reviews.reviewText: I am replacing my old wash with this. When I sweat there was a slight odor now my sweat have no odor. I stay clean throughout the day . I added my own scent to the fragrance free because I just need a little smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! I started using this product when Honey Pot changed its' formula. This product did not disappoint. I always feel fresh and clean without feeling dry or irritated after each use. I've received bottles with 2 different packaging methods and will say that i wish the company would come up with a safe and convenient method for packaging. One of the packaging designs I received had a plastic piece that was inserted into the bottle to keep the liquid safe and from spilling during shipping. The design could be better designed because the plastic can be rather difficult to remove. The other packaging type I recieved had a piece of tape on the outside of the bottle to keep the top from opening. However, the top could easily be unscrewed and the product could be tampered with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Female Wash!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best female wash i have found for sensitive women. No fragrance, perfectly cleans and balances natural PH without any harsh chemicals or fragrances. Leaves skin soft and moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is great!
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t had any issues in a year since I started using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love! Love! Love!!
reviews.reviewText: This wash is THE holy grail!! I use this product daily and work 8 hrs then go to the gym. By the time I get home, there is absolutely no sweaty smelll!!! I was so amazed, I had to set up a subscription!!! I've been on this earth for almost 40 years and no product has shocked me as much as this product has!! Currently in the process of telling my female family and friends about this.

reviews.reviewText: Not what I was expecting, doesn't lather therefor I am running out quick cause I feel as if I need to use a good chunk to make sure I am being actually washed
